overview_of_class: Digital control theory, design methodology, and techniques for controller implementation of digital computers. Discrete system modeling, system identification, and adaptive control methods. Single and multiaxis motion-generation algorithms. Multiple objective control systems for machinery guidance, manufacturing process, and precision control.
name: Computer Control in Manufacturing
title: MEAS MECH_ENG 439-0-1 Computer Control in Manufacturing

instructors.instructor_addr: Technological Institute, Rm A215, 2145 Sheridan Rd, EV CAMPUS
